dct_title_s: Energy map of Mexico/ produced by the Petroleum Economist Ltd., London in association with Petrobras ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Depth shown by shading. Shows oil and gas fields; import terminals; oil and gas product pipelines existing, under construction, and planned; and refineries; electricity power network with power stations by fuel type, international and state boundaries. Includes charts and statistical tables. "Published December 2007" © The Petroleum Economist Limited, London, December 2007.
